import React from 'react'; import leftImage from './images/classes.jpg'; import axios from 'axios'; class Timetable extends React.Component { state = { ttable: [], isLoaded: false } componentDidMount(){ axios.get('/wp-json/wp/v2/timetable') .then(res => this.setState({ ttable: res.data, isLoaded: true })) .catch(err => console.log(err)); } constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { condition: false } this.handleClick = this.handleClick.bind(this) } handleClick() { this.setState({ condition: !this.state.condition }) } render() { const {ttable, isLoaded } = this.state; if(isLoaded) { return (
